title: internet speed extremly slow on new client
body: When i start the alpha client it first checks the files then it started download at first it shows my downloading speed is 5mbps but soon it goes down to 1 mbps and then soon to 70 or 60 kbps i did a speed test and it shows my inter net speed is atleast 4mbps bit i don't know why it shows 60 kbps on the corner of the Aplha client

replies.body: Well that can make playing extremely difficult! The Client may not be getting the information it needs to get the download, so I would have you start by having you run through the [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). Make sure to run through all these steps and if you're still unable to get into the game, reach back out to me for help.
